optionalfeature.name: Druidic Warrior (Expanded)
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|level=0|class=druid}. If you are a ranger, they count as ranger spells for you. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the druid spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|level=0|class=wizard}. If you are a mageblade, they count as mageblade spells for you. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the wizard spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Blessed Warrior (Expanded)
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter cleric spell list|spells|level=0|class=cleric}. If you are a paladin, they count as paladin spells for you. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip from the cleric spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Wizard Wielding
entries: While you wield a one-handed weapon in one hand and a spellcasting focus in the other, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attacks and a +1 bonus to attacks with that weapon, and can fulfill somatic components with your spellcasting focus even if the spell has no material components.
